sentences.sentence: Within a month doctors told him that he had colorectal cancer.
sentences.translation: 不到一个月，医生告知他得了结肠癌。

sentences.sentence: But less than a month later Bell was diagnosed with colorectal cancer.
sentences.translation: 但仅仅过了一个月，贝尔便被诊断出患有结直肠癌。

sentences.sentence: Eating a hot dog every day can increase your risk of colorectal cancer by 21 percent.
sentences.translation: 每天一根热狗将使你罹患直肠癌的概率升高21%。
